org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.common.validator

Interface TimeValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Ieee1609Dot2TimeValidator

    public interface TimeValidator
    Interface for validating the time of a certificate or certificate chain

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void validateTime(java.util.Date currentTime, Certificate[] certificateChain, boolean entireChain)
      Method to verify that the given certificates are valid against the specified time.

    • Method Detail

      • validateTime

        void validateTime(java.util.Date currentTime,
                  Certificate[] certificateChain,
                  boolean entireChain)
           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                  InvalidCertificateException
        Method to verify that the given certificates are valid against the specified time.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - the expected time to verify the certificate against.
        certificateChain - the certificate to verify region in, end entity certificate first and root cert last.
        entireChain - if entireChain should be validated or only first certificate in chain.
        Throws:
        InvalidCertificateException - if the given certificate chain was invalid for the specified time.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if other argument was invalid when validation the certificate.
